siteTagline: Your all-in-one toolbox for client-side data manipulation.
siteDescription: The Online Everything Tool offers a vast collection of free, client-side utilities for various data transformation, generation, and exploration tasks.  It's perfect for developers, data analysts, and anyone needing quick, privacy-focused online tools.
siteBenefits: Access a wide variety of utilities in one place
Transform data quickly using client-side processing
Track your past operations with the History feature
Contribute new tools easily via the AI-assisted build process
Enjoy a consistent experience with Shoelace components
Works offline for many tools due to PWA setup
Ensure data privacy with client-side processing
